comments.body: I wouldn't say that this was resolved... The comment you have is hard to make sense of. For example, what does "we have now way" on the last line even mean?

it is following the norms as https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79386/commits/c3e079035a993c18a36963ba6865a64cb476857b?file-filters%5B%5D=.go#diff-8f965170bb98fe3252b76e74d095a57bR112. I can remove if needed
